title: intern magazine issue 0
author: _fertig

comments.content: Was expecting some bespoke typeface but looks pretty close (if not matching) to [Calluna](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070612/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/calluna) Black by exljbris Jos Buivenga to me...

Thanks alot Ryuk, that was quick =).

Looks like a match to me, if you look a the 't', or the slightly rising horizontal line of the 'e'.
